name: Garage Master 2018
description: Become a true mechanic â€“ fix different breakages with Garage Master 2018! Open the hood, examine the engine and power up several cars at once. Here you can not only to repair the car but to check it while racing! Impetuous drift and fantastic speed are waiting for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 / AMD ATI 5550 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 MB available space
